code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Admin.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Admin=()=>{const newAssignments;});};const handleSave=()=>{if(Object.values(pageComponents).some(components=>components.length===0)){alert('Each page must have at least one component!');return;}const 0:_pageComponents$page.map(component=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"component-item",children:[component,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"component-actions",children:allPages.filter(p=>p!==page).map(otherPage=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>moveComponent(component,page,otherPage),className:"move-button",title:`Move
